advancement.create.display_link.desc: Use a Display Link to visualize information
advancement.create.millstone.desc: Use a Millstone to pulverize materials
create.ponder.analog_lever.header: Controlling signals using the Analogue Lever
create.ponder.analog_lever.text_1: Analogue Levers make for a compact and precise source of redstone power
create.ponder.analog_lever.text_2: Right-click to increase its analogue power output
create.ponder.chain_gearshift.text_5: Using analogue signals, the ratio can be adjusted more precisely between 1 and 2
create.ponder.display_link.text_1: Display Links can be used to visualize dynamic information
create.ponder.speedometer.text_3: Comparators can emit analogue Restone Signals relative to the Speedometer's measurements
create.ponder.stressometer.text_3: Comparators can emit analogue Restone Signals relative to the Stressometer's measurements
create.schematic.tool.rotate.description: Rotates the Schematic around its centre.
